Requirement.Item: Keepers of a Feather Favor Rewards

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Knife Expertise
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to hit and damage with Daggers, Kukris, and throwing Daggers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Knife Juggler
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5% to speed with throwing Daggers. You gain the benefits of the Deflect Arrows feat, knocking aside one incoming projectile that would have struck you every 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Quick Reflexes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain Quickdraw as a bonus feat. You gain +5% Doublestrike and Doubleshot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: One With Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier with Daggers, Kukris and Throwing Daggers. Daggers and Throwing Daggers also gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Threat Range.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vistani Fortune
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain +10 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating. Activate to gain one random Vistani fortune. Cooldown 60 seconds. Coins: You gain 10% Doublestrike and 10% Doubleshot for 60 seconds. Glyphs: You gain 10 PRR and 20 MRR for 60 seconds. Stars: You gain +2 to all ability scores for 60 seconds. Swords: You gain 15 Melee Power and Ranged Power for 60 seconds.

Stance.Name: Vistani: Coins
Stance.Description: You gain 10% Doublestrike and 10% Doubleshot for 60 seconds.

Stance.Name: Vistani: Glyphs
Stance.Description: You gain 10 PRR and 20 MRR for 60 seconds.

Stance.Name: Vistani: Stars
Stance.Description: You gain +2 to all ability scores for 60 seconds.

Stance.Name: Vistani: Swords
Stance.Description: You gain 15 Melee Power and Ranged Power for 60 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Blade Master
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 to all ability scores. You gain +5% attack speed when using melee and throwing weapons. You gain 20 Melee Power and 20 Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vistani Knife Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When using a Dagger in each hand, you now fight in melee using the Vistani style, with both Daggers held point down. You gain +1 to hit and damage with Daggers, Kukris, and throwing Daggers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Undead Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You resist evil influences particularly well, gaining a +2 bonus to saves against spells and effects produced by evil creatures. Undead are automatically considered as a Favored Enemy for you.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +25% negative energy absorption. You gain +3 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Acrobatic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Balance, Jump, and Tumble. Rank 3: +1 to Reflex Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Rapid Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain both of the following: Rapid Slash: Requires dagger or kukri. Melee Attack: Deals +30% Damage. You gain a 20% Morale bonus to (main hand) doublestrike for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 10 seconds. Rapid Throw: Requires throwing knife. Missile Attack: Deals +30% Damage. You gain a 20% Morale bonus to doubleshot for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 10 seconds. This puts Ten Thousand Stars and Manyshot on a 10 second cooldown.

Effect.DisplayName: Vistani: Rapid Attack - Can be kept up 100%
Vistani: Rapid Throw - Can be kept up 100%

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vistani Knife Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with Daggers, Kukris, and throwing Daggers.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Bleeding Cuts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you score a Vorpal hit with a Dagger or throwing knife you add a stack of Blood of Vengeance to your opponent. Blood of Vengeance: You deal 1d6 damage per two seconds for 30 seconds. This damage scales with 200% Melee Power. This stacks up to 10 times, with new stacks refreshing the duration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +2 to Will saving throws. You gain +3 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Weapon Versatility
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Dagger, Kukri, and throwing Dagger attacks use the higher of Melee Power or Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Haste Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a [10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds

Attack.Name: Vistani: Haste Boost
Attack.Description: Activate to gain +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vistani Knife Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to hit and +1 damage with Daggers, Kukris, and throwing knives.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Fan of Knives
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: On activation: You throw a hail of throwing knives in a cone in front of you. Enemies caught in the cone take 1d8 damage per character level of damage and take one stack of Blood of Vengeance. This damage scales with 200% Ranged Power. Cooldown: 15 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You are immune to Fear effects. You gain +3 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Deadly Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Daggers, Kukris, and throwing Daggers do an additional +1[W] of damage. You are centered when fighting with Daggers and Kukris. (Note: not centered with throwing Daggers).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Gifted I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an ability to increase.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vistani Knife Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to hit and +2 damage with Daggers, Kukris, and throwing knives.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Celerity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5% Doublestrike and Doubleshot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain immunity to Energy Drain. You gain +3 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Double Daggers
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Single Dagger
EnhancementSelection.Description: When fighting single weapon style with a Dagger or Kukri: +20 Melee Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Double Daggers
EnhancementSelection.Description: When fighting with a Dagger or Kukri in each hand: +20% stacking chance to make off-hand attacks when dual wielding weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Gifted II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an ability of your choice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vistani Knife Training V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +3 to hit and damage with Daggers, Kukris, and throwing knives.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Throw or Hold the Grudge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a powerful throw ability or increase your hit points by holding a grudge.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Grudge Bearer
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain a +25% Competence bonus to Maximum Hitpoints

EnhancementSelection.Name: Whirling Blades
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals: +50% Damage Throwing Dagger Missile Attack: Your throwing knife gains 100 doubleshot for 15 seconds. Cooldown one minute.

Stance.Name: Vistani: Whirling Blades
Stance.Description: Your throwing knife gains 100 doubleshot for 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain +20% Dodge and Maximum Dodge, +30 PRR, and +30 MRR for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

Stance.Name: Vistani: Mist Stalker
Stance.Description: Activate to gain +20% Dodge and Maximum Dodge, +30 PRR, and +30 MRR for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Blessed Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Deals: +50% Damage Dagger or Kukri Melee attack. Applies one stack of Blood of Vengeance. Your equipped Daggers gain a +10 Enhancement bonus for 10 seconds. They also gain Silver, Good, and Ghost Touch. 10 second cooldown.
(Taking this ability also gives you Blessed Knives, the ranged version that requires a throwing Dagger.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Vistani: Vendetta
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a unique +1 Critical Threat Range and +1 to Critical damage multiplier to your equipped Daggers, Kukris, or throwing knife for 15 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

Stance.Name: Vendetta
Stance.Description: Activate to gain a unique +1 Critical Threat Range and +1 to Critical damage multiplier to your equipped Daggers, Kukris, or throwing knife for 15 seconds. 60 second cooldown.
